website_summaries.verdict: Popular for its fit and flexibility and can be worn comfortably beneath activewear.
pros: Laser-cut, hemless design eliminates lines, making it a solid choice for wear with form-fitting bottoms
Wearers love that it stays put and won't ride up like other designs
Unlike similar thongs, these are available in a multitude of prints
cons: Sides have a tendency to roll, and some women feel the sizing runs a bit small

customer_reviews.title: My favorite undies!
customer_reviews.text: Though these panties aren’t cheap, they are totally worth the money, in my opinion. I absolutely cannot stand most g-strings; they’re uncomfortable and create panty marks, which defeats the purpose of wearing a g-string. These panties are seamless, you cannot tell I have them on and plus, they’re actually as comfortable as a g-string can get. They don’t ride up my bum and they are so soft! I’ve now purchased about 10 pair and it’s all I wear when I have to don the g-string-thang.
customer_reviews.author: Pico

customer_reviews.title: Great for this Distance Runner
customer_reviews.text: Soft material, seamless with no lines. I tested a pair during a 15 mile long run with no body glide and my bikini area did not have any rashes or discomfort. I am so pleased with my purchase and will likely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren F.

customer_reviews.title: Best undies ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the absolute best underwear ever. No pantie lines, great for work clothes, active wear, etc. I wear these pretty much every day! They give you that barely there feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: It's only meant to be worn under super tight garments to be seamless (no panty line)
customer_reviews.text: It's only meant to be worn under super tight garments to be seamless. If you wear it like normal underwear, with a skirt, it will fall down. There is no elastic band at the waist to keep it up. If you wear it under super tight leather pants with a belt, it will work fine and you won't see the panty line. It might work with yoga pants, but it has no elastic band, so you'd have to test it out privately.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newell

customer_reviews.title: Tired of panty lines showing through my leggings
customer_reviews.text: I decided I was tired of having panty lines showing through my yoga leggings. These are the perfect solution and they hold up nicely and don't bother me on my long runs. I will definitely be buying more of these. I find them true to size and wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn White

customer_reviews.title: Superior comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with no dig ins. I'll reach past all the other to get to these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not very stable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a size 14/16 so I found I was a XL according to UA website. The underwear too fit and the material is super comfortable, but the sides roll down. I have to adjust them. However, when they roll you don't notice cause they so comfortable. Also they run slightly big. I'm not sure I could have sized down, but theyre not quite as secure as regular thongs.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Favorite undies
customer_reviews.text: Love this underwear. Difficult to find is stores. Its breathable, stretchy a d soft. Perfect for everyday or exercising.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wegmiller

customer_reviews.title: No-shows are perfect for leggings
customer_reviews.text: These no-show thongs are perfect for under leggings or really tight jeans, I'll be getting another pair for sure!
customer_reviews.author: tierneymarie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gym thongs!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing theses thongs for quite some time! They are very durable and lasting! They are also super seamless and go great under leggings or tights!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Better than cotton. Seamless, comfy, breatheable
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these for years, they're getting cheaper. still my favorite underwear but will probably start looking for a new favorite. Not Amazon's fault, it's underarmours.
customer_reviews.author: rnmassey

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not up to Under Armour standards. I washed them once and they are curling and frayig.
customer_reviews.author: Toni P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hardly felt these throughout my 14 hour work day. Ordered more in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: L. At

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: They r light an soft very comfortable might be one of the best tongs I own at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Best thongs I’ve bought! Skip pink/ Victoria secret stores!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I bought an XS, I’m 125lbs / 5’3. Have small hips & they fit incredibly well. They get loose of you’re doing a lot of physical activity with them though.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I love these for working out! I have same brand seamless underwear and, though they were comfortable, I wanted something I didn’t have to worry about bunching up. I’m 5’6” 135lbs and got a medium and they fit perfect. I have some more on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Great for when I run and lift
customer_reviews.text: These stay in place when I run and lift and I'm so glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Best thong ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and washes very well, does not shrink. They do run a smidge big.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Very soft and sleek. Lives up to promises of discretion.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Feel and look cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with these thongs, and am returning them. They feel very cheap. The edges look unfinished. I barely pulled on them and the edges rolled up. They’re also very stretchy. I have pictures, but can’t seem to find a spot to upload them.
customer_reviews.author: SamB

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of UA underwear before and I loved them. These are just as great & I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Mary McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but very thin. I suspect the material won’t last for longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Justice

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these. They fit perfect. And super comfortable, I forget I even have a pair on, they are that comfortable. Will be buying more, for sure
customer_reviews.author: Rottweiler Mom

customer_reviews.title: More than 1 color
customer_reviews.text: Picture only shows 1 color. It had 3 different colors. 1 was a very bright yellow, that I probably won’t wear as it’s too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Rolls
customer_reviews.text: I more or a heavy girl, and the fabric rolls terrible. Fits right though
customer_reviews.author: Destiny maney

customer_reviews.title: Too thin- rides up
customer_reviews.text: Should be comfortable, but too thin, so they don’t stay put if you move around. Since I bought them for working out, they don’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: DHP

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for working out, they’re very comfortable and fit just right!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cason

customer_reviews.title: SILKY SMOOTH!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! The fit is perfect, and they are super smooth! Great for working out, or normal wear!
customer_reviews.author: Siera

customer_reviews.title: Go one size down
customer_reviews.text: Love that it feels like you aren’t wearing anything. Does a run a bit of a size up but feels great!
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite things to wear under leggings for working out and just every day wear. Super comfortable and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Very good fabric!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft and the size is as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Niphattha

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very breathable and never get bunched up or twisted. Great for running or athletics.
customer_reviews.author: prattyl

customer_reviews.title: no panty lines
customer_reviews.text: Like them great fit! But if you sweat too much they stick to you!!
customer_reviews.author: Moneka  Halim

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Ripped at the top after one wash. Not very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Findlay JR

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Thong Printed Underwear 3-Pack
product_meta.description: Updated alpha sizing!. New super-soft stretch fabric delivers excellent all-day comfort for any activity. Laser cut edges offer a hem-free construction for a smoother, more flattering silhouette. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction. Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes. Exposed back ensures a seamless look even under UA Compression. Soft cotton gusset. Tagless construction.
feature_bullets: New super soft stretch fabric delivers excellent all day comfort for any activity
Laser cut edges offer a hem free construction for a smoother, more flattering silhouette
4 way stretch construction moves better in every direction
Anti odor technology prevents the growth of odor causing microbes
